item.title: Factorial
item.description: This is my first post and I am writing it to practice my markdown skills. I have chosen a very simple topic, Factorials. So, what is a factorial? In mathematics, the factorial of a positive integer n, denoted by n!, is the product of all positive integers less than or equal to n. 1 Also, The value of 0! is 1, according to the convention for an empty product.
